website_summaries.verdict: Whether you love Kettle Brand chips or are looking for a variety pack of single-serve bags for lunches, snack-time, and more, this box of 30 bags offers value in multiple flavors.
pros: Garners enthusiasm from Kettle Brand chip lovers who like to try some of the most popular flavors, as this pack of 30 contains 4 – BBQ, Jalapeno, Sea Salt & Vinegar, and Salt & Pepper
cons: You may not like all of the flavors, but this 30-pack is still a good deal

customer_reviews.title: Too much Jalapeno
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety pack for the most part, but why does it have to have double the Jalapeno chips? They're not my favorite and the Husband can't handle spicy food at all, so even though they're not at all spicy by my standards, Husband won't touch the Jalapeno chips, so I'm stuck with them. I wouldn't be complaining if it had the same number of Jalapeno chips as every other flavor, but DOUBLE Jalapeno chips? Come on!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Awesome Value
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. Saw it in a lighting deal and snagged it up. Portions are perfect for my lunches. I personally love the jalapeño flavor so super happy I came with double. I highly recommend this value pack since it seriously comes out to about $0.50 a bag!!! I'm not sure why people give this a low rating simply because of double jalapeño flavor. It clearly states how many of each flavor in the describe AND image. Either way, I'm satisfied and happy.
customer_reviews.author: StephieJolls

customer_reviews.title: Way too many Jalapeno flavors
customer_reviews.text: I love Kettle chips, but this one has twice as many Jalapeno flavors as everything else. No one else in the family will east those because they're so hot, so I'm the only one that will eat those, which means I don't usually get to eat the flavors that I actually like. I wish the flavors were evenly distributed or even more heavily distributed on the other 3 flavors. We won't be ordering again since we don't like the flavor that makes up 40% of the box...
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Expiry Date too Close
customer_reviews.text: At first I was completely satisfied with this product. I absolutely love chips and it's great that there are alternatives that are not deep fried. However when I happened to see the expiration date on the bag, I realized that it is expiring in a couple of days. The last thing I'd expect when buying something at FULL PRICE is an expiry date that is so close. How am I supposed to finish 20 bags in 2 days?
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Darwish

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this pack for our son. He doesn't like jalapeno, so we ended up with half, as half of them were jalapeno. They were crisp and tasty. Some jalapeno flavors have a funky aftertaste, these do not. Honestly, I think our son would have liked them had he tried them. A hint of heat but just enough to tell you what you're eating. The bags are good sized- and were fresh. The cheese flavored was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Chips are fantastic - packaging is crazy
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the bags are so tough that if you don't use scissors, you will end up pulling so hard on the bag that the chips will spray all over the ground. Not good for vendors at events. You will be giving refunds. But the chips themselves are super tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty chip bag lol
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of chips.... one of the bags was just air 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Lena Walker

customer_reviews.title: Read to see the assortment
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read the description that stated these come with TWELVE of the Jalapeño chips. Who needs 12 bags of Jalapeño chips?! I don't think anyone even ate one of the bags of the Jalapeño. Disappointed these weren't a more universal selection of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Kettle Chips mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice and noticed the first box had 13 bags of Jalapeno and 3 BBQ and mixed amt of the others. I kind of expected equal amts. Luckily my family likes the Hot ones, on the other hand my wife doesn't al all. My second order the mix was more equal but exactly. Good chips fast delivery. On the bad side, My second order was delivered on a Sunday before 8AM! I feel that is too early for some people who can only sleep in on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Giles

customer_reviews.title: Equal amount of each flavor
customer_reviews.text: I think it would be a better variety if you had equal amount of each flavor . Having twice as many jalapeno as the other flavors reduces the variety I would rather have 6 Jalapeno and another flavor or you could remove the jalapeno and give two other flavors that would be 5 stars to me and think would be a good option
customer_reviews.author: Rich Rouquette

customer_reviews.title: Noooooo they're stale!
customer_reviews.text: I figured small bags would stay fresh longer than an open big bag and also help with portion control (in theory). I chose this mix because it contained 2 of my favorites - salt and vinegar kettle chips and spicy tortilla chips. Big disappointment. Both were stale to the point of being inedible. The plain chips and pretzel chips, however, were fine (go figure). Each type of chip had a different expiration date, but none were expired and the bags were sealed. How does this happen?
customer_reviews.author: D. Buss

customer_reviews.title: Over-satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I needed to spice up my life during this quarantine, so i bought this. I’ve only had jalapeño prior to this purchase, but all these flavors are good. Not overwhelming at all. If you’re reading reviews for a box of potato chips, you’ve already made up your mind
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: Way too much salt
customer_reviews.text: I like a salty chip as well as most but these have at least 2 times the salt of an ordinary chip and all you taste is salt. I don't know if it's just the batch I got or what but I can't hardly eat these with the overly salted flavor. I tried each flavor in the box but really all I taste is salt.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Morris

customer_reviews.title: Delish, larger bags than in grocery store, but too many jalapeno flavored
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value and delish. They are packaged well for shipment (although, strangely, they required a UPS signature for last delivery!). My only complaint is that they should include equal number of bags of each flavor. There are too many jalapeno flavored bags, which are my least favorite. I have reordered a few times despite this limitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Soggy chips
customer_reviews.text: Several of the bags had soggy chips. Yuck. My kids quickly gave up and wouldn’t take any of them. I got a huge box. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: mmad

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived double boxed so no damaged chips and the snack size is perfect for lunches. My family likes these because they are quality and seem to have a bit more in the packages than those bought in a grocery store. I gave four stars because I was expecting there to be equal packages of each flavor but there was twice as many Jalapeno chips as any of the other flavors listed.
customer_reviews.author: ElenaD3LV

customer_reviews.title: To: Whoever packages this “variety” pack
customer_reviews.text: Great product BUT WHY is variety so imbalanced?? One NewYork Cheddar flavor, 5-6 BBQ and Sea Salt — and the rest (15-20) Jalapeño!!?? Not cool. Balance it out Kettle folks!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Too many jalapeño
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I’m disappointed that they thought it was best to have only 6 of 3 flavors and 12 of jalapeño. Seems a bit uneven to me. Would probably make more sense to have 32 bags and do 8 of each. If you really like jalapeño chips, this is for you. I won’t buy again until they even it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Love the Jalapeno chips!
customer_reviews.text: I try not to buy this too often because it's addictive. Don't prefer the salt and vinegar but my son loves it and hates the jalapeno, so we get along! Not a lot of chips in the bag so no need to feel guilty about it. It's good stay-at-home-from-covid snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: These went quick...
customer_reviews.text: The flavours were fine and they all arrived safe. They were well liked because it they went quick.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Porgie

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix of chips
customer_reviews.text: Great mix of chips but unfortunately the box was taped a lot and six bags were missing so I received 24 out of 30 that I paid for, so not sellers fault but the box says what they are and looks tamerped with - glad they are individually packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips. I love the jalapeno. I especially got this configuration (as specified) because of the high jalapeno ratio. They were fresh and delicious. I compared the cost to Sam's.com. Same cost. Amazon's free shipping wins!
customer_reviews.author: TheCrozetParaclete

customer_reviews.title: Everything fine until eating "Salt & Vinegar"
customer_reviews.text: All the flavors were good until I ate from the "Salt & Vinegar" bag, which floored me with the overwhelming "vinegar & salt" flavor. If I had known how very distasteful it would be, I would not have ordered the chips. I am entirely dissatisfied with the chips , & would ask for reimbursement for the 6 bags of "Salt & Vinegar" in the form of 6 bags of "Salt & Black Pepper" coupons or credit to my Amazon account.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: is tha gud good sh**.
customer_reviews.text: is good i bought 2 box's and now im back 3 months later with some info, DON'T GO ON KETTLE COOKED ONLY DIET , at the end of the second box i was having stomach pains for days litterally made me throw up most times i drank water , it would come back up and now i have to eat health bars for months F!
customer_reviews.author: Devo H C

customer_reviews.title: Bags open at the seem
customer_reviews.text: I am on a subscription for this product so that my kids would have them just for lunch this is my second box and this box came and a lot of the bags are opened at the seem I am not happy I didn't open them right away because we had chips from another order.
customer_reviews.author: Director of business

customer_reviews.title: Defective chip bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this variety pack and thought it was a good value. However, upon opening A few of the bags I realized there was only like 5 chips in some of the bags. A few of the bags were deflated and you can tell from the get go something wasn’t right. This is not ok!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Olmedo

customer_reviews.title: Stale, watch out
customer_reviews.text: It was a waste of money and bad for the environment because I couldn't eat the chips they were all stale...
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good but Do Not Care for the Tropical
customer_reviews.text: The fiesta box was good, but a little disappointed with the tropical salsa flavor, was very bland. It should be taken off the boxes and just keep the other 3 flavors. Recommended but just don't expect much on the tropical.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeraldas12

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have will power, stay away of these
customer_reviews.text: These were so fresh and crispy I had to use a lot of self control not to eat 2 or 3 bags at a time. The pack had 12 Jalapeño and 6 of each of the others. Loved them all and am going back to order another box.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: My delivery drivers love these chips
customer_reviews.text: I keep a box of snacks outside my front door for delivery drivers, and I always include some of these chips in the box. My drivers seems to like them better than most of the other snacks that I leave out.
customer_reviews.author: James Astro

customer_reviews.title: Not My Taste
customer_reviews.text: The flavors were either too strong or too weak depending on the bag. Spice is not a flavor and I feel like they went over board with the seasoning of the chips to the point where they're very unpleasant to eat. I didnt really enjoy any of the flavors and now im stuck with a bunch of bag of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Jaye

customer_reviews.title: The assortment of chips were great
customer_reviews.text: These chips were kettle cooked and that was wonderful I got an assortment pack, the jalapeño chips were very hard for our family if you like hot order the jalapeño all the others were special in their own way I would have given it five stars except I changed it to a four because of the chips that were too hot which is really my opinion and not the companies problem
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: Mostly excellent to good chips that aren't too salty, however the vinegar were too sour.
customer_reviews.text: We are chip fanatics. So, how did these fair on our opinions? The potato chips were fresh and mostly whole. They were very crisp and had good thickness being neither too thin or thick. Our favorite flavor, being unanimous, was sea salt and pepper. Those were excellent! But, was there a flavor not liked? Yes, the vinegar and sea salt was too sour. There are vinegar flavored potato chips out there we do like, just not this one. The jalapena was good, but barbeque was ok, not at all bad, but just fine. I like the fact the chips weren't too salty like most of the top brand potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: southern heritage

customer_reviews.title: Great chips.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these chips. Although if I was to get this again, I'd only get the BBQ ones. I love Salt and Vinegar chips. But these are way salty to the point of my ankles swelled up, and they never swell when I eat that flavor. The Jalapeño chips are good. The only bad thing is the flavor of the chips tend to stay in the mouth way past you actually eating them. The salt and pepper chips are not bad. I do recommend only getting the flavor you know you like.
customer_reviews.author: MPLIM

customer_reviews.title: Open bags
customer_reviews.text: About 1/3 of the bags in this box were open and the chips were spilled out in the box. It must have been like that for sometime because there are oil stains throughout the bottom inside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: C+M

customer_reviews.title: Great for family dinner
customer_reviews.text: We have Sunday family dinners and this Sunday we had smoked ribs, baked beans and potato salad. The variety of chips and the individual packages make them perfect for our outdoor social distance dinners.
customer_reviews.author: peter sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Open bags and not a lot of chips for the money
customer_reviews.text: Most of the packages in this box are cracked open. Out of the ones that make it most of them have barely any chips in them. I opened on bag and it have 2 chips. You read that right. Two chips in a bag. Look elsewhere and don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, decent ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting chips. Not the cheapest, but it makes it up with the flavor and ingredients. I like the benefit of having smaller portion bags to help with freshness and calories control.
customer_reviews.author: DiM

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy Brain.
customer_reviews.text: So I remember thinking about ordering these. But I don’t remember actually ordering them (Pregnancy brain). I’m not unhappy though. I got some chips. I love the brand. They’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I usually love these chips
customer_reviews.text: The bags were not sealed on the side. As they sat for 3 weeks the glue used to close them or the heat seal failed and the product became limp, soggy. Too late to return. I believe a carton of chips should last longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cable

customer_reviews.title: Good thing husband likes Jalapeño
customer_reviews.text: The box has mostly Jalapeño and not a single pack of Sea Salt and Vinegar, so bit if a mixed bag, so to speak, for variety pack. The other chips are good, but a true mix of bags would have been nice. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mariann R.

customer_reviews.title: Chips are good!
customer_reviews.text: Chips arrived on time and safely packed. Tried the Jalapeno and they were tasty. Not too hot. The issue is I only received 29 bags. There were only 5 Sea Salt not six. It is always difficult to get a correction for missing food items.
customer_reviews.author: Faye B

customer_reviews.title: Love Kettle chips
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price on July lightning deal. But as someone else commented, there are too many Jalapeño flavored. They should even out the number of bags per flavor. Those jalapeño don’t hit till you stop eating, so just keep eating them. HOT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Some bags were opened
customer_reviews.text: Kettle makes a great chip, but some of the jalapeno flavor bags were completely open in the back. It appears that the glue holding the bag together failed. We had to discard them.
customer_reviews.author: Lostinbooks

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, diverse flavors
customer_reviews.text: I tried these at Jimmy John’s. They are tasty compliments with sandwiches, for snacks. The jalapeño is a nice spicy accent with plain meals. Nice to crumble and add to casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: So delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these chips! I got them in April and they don't expire until September 2020, so anyone that is afraid they are going to get stale chips, I can say that the box I got was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Crunch with mild flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived slightly crushed but kettle chips are hearty. Great flavor, not too strong on spice. Chip qty in bag seems to have shrunk but could be settling. Overall, satisfied with the variety.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Kettle is King
customer_reviews.text: Loved the freshness, crispness and flavor. It was shipped in the original manufacturers packaging. Sizeable quantity for larger families not offered in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndirella

customer_reviews.title: Too many Jalapeno Flavored Chips
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star review if the package did not come with so many of the Jalapeno Flavored chips. Don't get me wrong, the chips taste great but I wish they would add less of the Jalapeno Flavored chips. The price is on point for the amount of chip bags that you get in each pack. I recommend these chips.
customer_reviews.author: shoppin' gal

customer_reviews.title: Most bags were busted open.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips, unfortunately most bags were busted open at the seams when it Arrived. They need to add something to the box so the bags don’t move around as much during transit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Variety and spicy
customer_reviews.text: My favorite chips in a variety I can share. Jalapeno chips that are actually a little spicy. Salt and pepper crinkles that are yummy. My daughter's favorite is the salt and vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: SharonsRose13

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. Way too salty and the flavors taste odd. I enjoy Mexican flavors and this was not it. Kettle your bbq and regular salt flavor are good. Please stick to that and not this
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: very good quality and flavor assortment (3 of 4)
customer_reviews.text: Good variety pack of excellent quality chips. jalapeno and salt & pepper are my favorite flavors. The barbecue is also very good. Less enthusiastic about the salt and vinegar, but it's good for a salt and vinegar flavor.
customer_reviews.author: R Bull

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: If you like spiceh ships, this is your box! The tropical salsa are THE BEST! I kind of wish they have a box of JUST THOSE. But they're all good. Perfect for lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Why so many jalapeño packs?
customer_reviews.text: The chips are great, but why does each variety pack have so many dang jalapeño packs??? The jalapeño are good, but I don't need 12 packs of them and only 6 of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Karóbahúzó

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and the value is great at time of the C19. Most other sellers sell it at a higher price, which is ridiculous. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Ma

customer_reviews.title: FINGER LICKING GOOD
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best chips out there. Love the convenience of delivery with amazon and the quality of the chips are never compromised, always fresh and great portion sized bags. I only buy these from amazon, you should too.
customer_reviews.author: Sib

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these chips! No matter how big the bag I buy, he will eat the whole thing. Having these small bags handy we’re perfect so he still had his chip, but not too many. They were fresh and tastey.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine s quizaman

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Talk about stale potato chips...these were awful. I can’t recommend. Price, shipping, availability doesn’t compensate for the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: KD Murray, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Great for portion control. I liked all the flavors and found them to be fresh and crisp. They are also gmo free. Would order again as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: NoID

customer_reviews.title: Mixed flavor chips with good size packed
customer_reviews.text: They have few varieties flavor chips in a box . I like almost all of them except vinegar flavor chip is savored. Good package box . It taste fresh and delicious .
customer_reviews.author: Rejoice

customer_reviews.title: The variety was okay
customer_reviews.text: You certainly get a lot of chips but the variety was just okay for me. There were more jalapeño and salt and vinegar chips then the others. Almost twice the amount. Those are my least two favorite in the pack. Maybe a more even mix would be better.
customer_reviews.author: JW1970

customer_reviews.title: Where are them bbq?
customer_reviews.text: I love kettle brand chips but the box came only with 3 bag of bbq flavor out of the 30. Very disappointing but everything did taste amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ze

customer_reviews.title: back seal running down the chips were not seals got alot of open bag chips
customer_reviews.text: Be careful alot of the chips were unseals in the back part as if the seal wasnt sealed, not what anyone needs at this time gross and very concerning
customer_reviews.author: Niknac

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are great, very strong. Of course, you've probably had them before. Were they worth the bulk buy...? No. But they were good
customer_reviews.author: Eli Vincent Schroeck

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chips in serving sizes to save me from myself
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop eating these chips so the smaller packs are a life saver that satisfy with just the right amount of yum. Good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gekcho

customer_reviews.title: Not an even assortment
customer_reviews.text: There’s 12 bags of Jalapeño flavor and 6 bags of each of the other 3 flavors!! Why on earth wouldn’t there be a more even distribution of the flavors?!
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like these chips. They arrived and weren't all crushed up. Flavors are great. Husband really likes the Jalapeno. I enjoy the black pepper. All of them are good and have great crunch!
customer_reviews.author: Ranchgal35

customer_reviews.title: they are ok
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look closely enough as the bags are just 1 oz, they have a decent flavor but many in the bag being baked are hard to chew up, I was disappointed over all
customer_reviews.author: C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was half asleep and saw a notice that they were available and almost sold out. I should have gone to sleep. There is nothing special about these chips and most of the bags are more than half empty. What a rip off. They are bland, even the jalapeno ones are bland. I gave the rest away. Will not repurchase
customer_reviews.author: bmedic

customer_reviews.title: SOME CHIP BAGS NOT SEALED
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item in the past with no issues. However this shipment had a problem. All the Jalapeno flavored chip bags side seal were open. The bags were sealed at the top, but the back of the bag seal was wide open.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE B

customer_reviews.title: They are great chips
customer_reviews.text: These chips are great. Kettle chips have never disappointed me. I wish they have an option for me to mix and match what I want. I really enjoyed the BBQ and Jalapeno favor.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hu

customer_reviews.title: Great chips but a few bags were squashed
customer_reviews.text: A few bags were squashed flat and had lost air. We ate those first. Not sure how this can happen as the carton was fully intact.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavors. You will not regret buying these chips I promise
customer_reviews.text: Love the varieties and flavors of these chips I can’t find them in the store they are very good and addictive, I recommend you try these you will definitely like them.
customer_reviews.author: LORRI

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips, Lots of my least favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Classic box-o-chips, right down to the "heres twice as much of our least popular flavor". This is great if you or someone in the house likes the Jalapeno flavor. if you don't you will either grow to love it or toss a quarter of the box. Kettle is one of my favorite brands of chips. The flavors are strong, the chips are really crunchy, and a small bag can really hit the spot. Ingredients are simple, and aside from being potatoes cooked in fat, they seem healthy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: More bags of jalapeño flavor per box of these variety Boxes - less of the other flavors. Wish we could choose which flavors we wanted more of and that there was more variety but good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle González

customer_reviews.title: Jalapeno is 40% of total and I like that!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite chips collection, and lucky for me I like jalapeno (because it's 40% of the box). If you're not into spicy or sour flavors (jalapeno, vinegar, or pepper) then this package is not for you. If you are, then you'll like it! My kids eat the barbecue flavor only and can go through the salt & pepper one. There are 12 jalapeno, 6 sea salt and vinegar, 6 salt and pepper and 6 backyard barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: Incommunicado

customer_reviews.title: TOO MANY jalapeño flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Better read the fine print... WAY TOO MANY jalapeño flavor. There are double the amount of jalapeño, which i do not like at all! Won’t be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chips
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my large box full of 30 packs of Kettle chips. I appreciate the variety and portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Nails

customer_reviews.title: Missing packs
customer_reviews.text: There were only 28 in the box. Ordered it for a group of 30 and it has 2 missing.
customer_reviews.author: Nas

customer_reviews.title: Kettle brand is great my definite go to addition to a sandwich .
customer_reviews.text: If u love that kettle brand chip then this variety pack is for you especially if u have not tried the other variety they have ...product arrived On time and as advertised would buy again from this seller ...already planning on having the sea salt n vinegar variety tomorrow for lunch with a tuna salad sandwich mmmmm lunch time or anytime its all gravy!!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Always fresh and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Always fresh and delicious. Jalapeno is the favorite in my home and I wish there were more in the box.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good but open bags in box
customer_reviews.text: These are great for lunches at home or for work. But in the last box that I purchased, there were 4 open bags in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Read description carefully before you order
customer_reviews.text: Chips are of excellent quality but I do not care for the jalapeno flavor and too many of these are included. It is clearly listed in the description, I just prefer the salt & vinegar flavor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Helen888

customer_reviews.title: The best chips in the world
customer_reviews.text: Other than having too much of one flavor than the rest they came fresh and packaged well. My family loves this brand and the flavors. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited I found these for $5!! My husband and kids love them! And cheaper than going to a main grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: Food good But delivery sucks, how would you like to find a food idem on top of your dirty trashcan👎😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Young

customer_reviews.title: great office snack
customer_reviews.text: very popular with the crew, I'll think about buying another box or two in the future. the jalapeno seemed to be the last part of the box that was left by the last day. they were darn tasty though!
customer_reviews.author: funkbear85

customer_reviews.title: Please take me off the order each month.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like these chips almost all of them were hot chips I didn’t like the banquet ones so I’m going to try others I’ve already ordered for April.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Took a while and was worth
customer_reviews.text: Great crispy potato chips with lots flavor; delivered somewhat later than originally. Guess they did fry them especially for me 😊
customer_reviews.author: Helmut Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: YUM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very please and satisfied thank you for not letting me regret spending my money... tasty and yummy and fresh thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Sunev

customer_reviews.title: The flavor of the jalapeño chips were little to none..
customer_reviews.text: The jalapeno chips mostly tasted like regular potato chips. I'm not sure if that's how they come but they barely had any flavor. All the other chip variants had the correct flavor though
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not enough of my favorite ( salt vinegar) might not order again for that reason, but product it self is good
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Salt and pepper is the worst flavor imaginable
customer_reviews.text: Great chips. Except for salt and pepper. If there is a hell the only flavor they have is salt and pepper. Which taste neither like salt and pepper but what I imagine dried raccoon **** taste like.
customer_reviews.author: jason cargill

customer_reviews.title: Great chips but unequal numbers
customer_reviews.text: Zero idea why, but every time we order we get way more jalapeno flavor than any other, so we stopped buying. Just wish they'd provide an equal number of each flavor.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rekenthaler

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few times. Always fresh, and great variety of flavors! Definiely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Amount of Flavors! :(  WHY?
customer_reviews.text: Very few plain chips and too many jalapeño, cheddar and BBQ. Was not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beanage

customer_reviews.title: Missing chips
customer_reviews.text: The Salt and Pepper was not in the box. It was instead replaced with more Jalapeno chips.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina  O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Mmm good
customer_reviews.text: Great chips and I enjoy all of the crunchy flavors in this box. I especially like the cheese ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: Don’t usually have an issue with getting theses delivered but today the box was beat up bad, so I’m going to cancel my monthly delivery. These are my husbands favorite but it’s just a box of crumbs this month. They are good chips just wish everybody handling the box would have taken better care.
customer_reviews.author: Omaha

product_meta.title: Kettle Brand Potato Chips Variety Pack, Sea Salt & Vinegar, Krinkle Salt & Pepper, Backyard BBQ and Jalapeno, 30 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Variety Pack Salt & Vinegar, Salt & Pepper, Backyard Barbeque, and JalapnoHot fun in the summer time (or anytime)! Here's an entire variety pack of Kettle Brand Potato Chips fun led off by a dozen bags of our zesty Jalapeno, and then six bags each of our wind-whipped Sea Salt & Vinegar, earthy sublime Backyard Barbecue and basically delightful Salt & Fresh Ground Pepper. It's your own family adventure in a, easy to store pantry box.
feature_bullets: 6 Sea Salt and Vinegar, 6 Krinkle Cut Salt and Fresh Ground Pepper, 6 Backyard Barbeque and 12 Jalapeno bags
1.5 oz single-serve bags are great for snacking on-the-go
Your favorite flavors of thick-cut, crunchy kettle cooked Kettle Brand potato chips
All natural ingredients: Non-GMO Project Verified, No MSG, No artificial colors or flavors
Certified Gluten Free, No trans fat, Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
